module.name: LResources
module.short: Maintains a global list of Lazarus resources, and provides methods and types used to stream components.

descr.p: lresources.pp maintains and stores all standard Lazarus resources in the global LazarusResources list and provides methods and types for component streaming.
A Lazarus resource is streamed as an UTF-8 string, with a name, value and value type.
Lazarus resources are normally included via an include directive in the initialization part of a unit. To create such include files use the BinaryToLazarusResourceCode procedure.
To create an LRS file from an LFM file use the LFMtoLRSfile function which transforms the LFM text to binary format and stores it as Lazarus resource include file.
Author: Mattias Gaertner
lresources.pp is part of the Lazarus Component Library (LCL).

element.name: LRSComment
element.short: Text of the "automatically generated..." warning in resource files.

element.name: TFilerSignature
element.short: Signature for a the version of the TFiler instance used to read or write value using a Lazarus Resource Stream (LRS file).

element.name: TLResource
element.short: Describes a Lazarus resource stored in TLResourceList.

element.name: TLResource.Name
element.short: Name for the Lazarus resource.

element.name: TLResource.ValueType
element.short: The resource type, always uppercase.

element.name: TLResource.Value
element.short: The value for the resource.

element.name: TLResourceList
element.short: Container class used for Lazarus resource descriptions.

element.name: TLResourceList.FList
element.short: Member with the list for resource descriptions.

element.name: TLResourceList.FMergeList
element.short: List used to MergeSort resources in the list.

element.name: TLResourceList.FSortedCount
element.short: The number of resource descriptions in the sorted list.

element.name: TLResourceList.FindPosition
element.short: Returns the index of the named resource, or -1 if not found.

descr.p: The list is sorted, if required.

element.name: TLResourceList.FindPosition.Result
element.short: Ordinal position for the named resource in the list, or -1 when not found.

element.name: TLResourceList.FindPosition.Name
element.short: Name of the resource to locate in the list of descriptions.

element.name: TLResourceList.Sort
element.short: Sorts the list by resource name.

element.name: TLResourceList.MergeSort
element.short: Implements a MergeSort for the resource descriptions in the list.

element.name: TLResourceList.Merge
element.short: Performs the merge portion of the MergeSort method.

element.name: TLResourceList.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Allocates resources needed for the internal lists used in the class instance, and sets the default values for internal members.

element.name: TLResourceList.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Frees the values in and resources allocated to the internal lists for the class instance.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add
element.short: Adds a resource description to the list with the specified values.

descr.p: ValueType is stored in uppercase.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.Name
element.short: Name for the resource.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.ValueType
element.short: Name for the Type used in the value.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.Value
element.short: A single AnsiString value string for the type.

element.name: TLResourceList.Add.Values
element.short: An array with the String values for the type.

element.name: TLResourceList.Find
element.short: Returns the resource in the list with the given name and type.

element.name: TLResourceList.Find.Result
element.short: TLResource instance for the resource found with the specified name and value type.

element.name: TLResourceList.Find.Name
element.short: Name of the resource to locate in the list.

element.name: TLResourceList.Find.ValueType
element.short: Type name for the resource to locate in the method. Should be uppercase, if present.

element.name: TLResourceList.Count
element.short: Gets the number of resource descriptions in the list.

element.name: TLResourceList.Count.Result
element.short: The number of resource descriptions in the list.

element.name: TLResourceList.Items
element.short: Provides Indexed access to the resource descriptions in the list.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream
element.short: Helper class for streaming resources (read only).

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.FPRes
element.short: Resource in FPC format.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize
element.short: Initializes the resource descriptor.

descr.p: The descriptor must already exist.

element.errors: EResNotFound if the resource does not yet exist.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize.Name
element.short: The resource name.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Initialize.ResType
element.short: The resource type, can be Nil.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create
element.short: Creates an resource stream for a named resource.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create.ResName
element.short: The resource name.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Create.ResType
element.short: The resource type, can be Nil.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID
element.short: Creates an resource stream for a resource ID.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID.ResID
element.short: The resource ID.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromID.ResType
element.short: The resource type.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.CreateFromHandle
element.short: Creates an resource stream from an resource descriptor.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Calls the UnlockResource and FreeResource routines when resource descriptors are used for the platform. Calls the inherited method prior to exit.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Write
element.short: Raises an error on an attempt to write to the stream.

descr.p: The stream data must be provided by the implemented constructors and methods.

element.errors: Raises a EStreamError exception with the message in SCantWriteResourceStreamError.

element.name: TLazarusResourceStream.Res
element.short: The resource descriptor, owned by the global resource list.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator
element.short: Abstract base class for translators used in the LCL.

descr.p: TAbstractTranslator is a class which specifies the base class string and property translators used in the Lazarus Component Library (LCL). It defines an abstract virtual method used to translate string properties when they are read from a Lazarus Resource Stream (LRS).
Do not create instances of TAbstractTranslator; use one of the descendent class like TUpdateTranslator, TDefaultTranslator, or TPOTranslator.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty
element.short: Specifies a method used to translate a String property.

descr.p: TranslateStringProperty is an abstract virtual method which defines the method used to translate a String property in a persistent object instance. TranslateStringProperty must be implemented in a descendent class to perform the actions needed to retrieve and translate the specified property value.
The address for the method is assigned as the OnReadStringProperty event handler in TReader class instances.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty.Sender
element.short: Object for the event notification.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty.Instance
element.short: Persistent object with the property value translated in the method.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty.PropInfo
element.short: RTTI information for the property translated in the method.

element.name: TAbstractTranslator.TranslateStringProperty.Content
element.short: Variable parameter where the translated value for the property is returned.

element.name: LRSTranslator
element.short: Variable with the default translator used in CreateLRSReader.

descr.p: The value for the variable is assigned when SetDefaultLang is called.

element.name: TLRSItemType
element.short: Stack item type for the nested resource reader/writer.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitCollection
element.short: A list terminated by an EndList.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitComponent
element.short: A component has two lists: properties and children.

element.name: TLRSItemType.lrsitList
element.short: A list with a known (stored) number of entries.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem
element.short: Stack item for the nested resource reader.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem.Name
element.short: Name for the item on the LRS Reader Object stack.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem.ItemType
element.short: Identifies the type for the stack item.

element.name: TLRSORStackItem.PushCount
element.short: The number of contained collections, needing an EndList.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader
element.short: Reader for resource streams.

descr.p: Uses an stack for reading nested objects.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBuffer
element.short: The input stream buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufSize
element.short: Size of the input buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufPos
element.short: Current position in the input buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FBufEnd
element.short: The number of bytes in the buffer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FStack
element.short: The object stack.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.FStackCapacity
element.short: The Length of the allocated stack.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipProperty
element.short: Skip the property name, then the property value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipSetBody
element.short: Skips until the next empty string.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push
element.short: Push a new resource item.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push.Root
element.short: The Component whose properties follow.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Push.PushCount
element.short: The number of contained lists, which need an EndList.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Pop
element.short: Pop an item, or decrement its PushCount.

descr.p: Called on EndList (vaNull) encountered

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ClearStack
element.short: Destroys the stack, during reader destruction.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.InternalReadValue
element.short: Reads the 1-byte value type.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.EndPropertyIfOpen
element.short: Terminate reading a Component list (properties or children).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIntegerContent
element.short: Reads an 4 byte integer value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Create.AStream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Create.BufSize
element.short: The stream buffer size to allocate.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.NextValue
element.short: Peek the next byte (value type indicator).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadValue
element.short: Reads the next ValueType. Pops or pushes a stack item if required (for list or collection).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.BeginRootComponent
element.short: Reads the filer signature from the input.
element.errors: EReadError 'Invalid Filer Signature' on filer signature mismatch.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.GetStackPath
element.short: Returns the qualified current item name.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Read
element.short: Read a number of bytes from the input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadBinary
element.short: Reads binary data, stored with a Length prefix.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadFloat
element.short: Reads an Extended value (10 Bytes).
element.descr: The result may have less bytes, when Extended is not a 10 byte value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSingle
element.short: Reads an Single value (4 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadCurrency
element.short: Reads an Currency value (8 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadDate
element.short: Reads an Date value (8 bytes).

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIdent
element.short: Reads an identifier, maybe a name or a standard key (which is not stored).
element.errors: GDB error on an unexpected ValueType.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadIdent.ValueType
element.short: The expected type: vaIdent for an stored name, or vaNil, vaFalse, vaTrue, vaNull for an standard string.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet
element.short: Reads enum member names, until an empty string is read.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet.Result
element.short: The constructed set, as an Integer.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadSet.EnumType
element.short: The expected set type.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.ReadStr
element.short: Reads an ShortString.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipComponent
element.short: Skips an entire Component.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipComponent.SkipComponentInfos
element.short: If True: skip prefix, component class name and component object name.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.SkipValue
element.short: Skips the next value.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Stream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectReader.Reader
element.short: The root component reader.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState
element.short: Tracking what already has been stored or written.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisStarted
element.short: now writing header.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisHeaderWritten
element.short: header saved on stack, not yet written to stream, waiting for data.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItemState.lrsowsisDataWritten
element.short: header written to stream, data written.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem
element.short: Stack item for the nested resource writer.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem.PushCount
element.short: waiting for this number of Pops.

element.name: TLRSOWStackItem.ItemNr
element.short: Index in a collection or list.

element.name: TLRSObjectWriter
element.short: Object writer for Lazarus Resource Streams.
element.descr: The TLRSObjectWriter can find empty entries and omit writing them to stream.

element.name: TLRSObjectWriter.WriteWordsReversed
element.short: Writes multiples words (WideChar) with reversed byte order.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Allocates the internal list used to store values in the Data property.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Frees resources allocated for the Data property, and calls the inherited method prior to exit.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Clear
element.short: Removes items stored in the Data property.

descr.p: Sets the value in the Count property to 0, which causes the items stored in Data to be freed.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Sort
element.short: Sort the items by LFM or LRS position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Sort.LFMPositions
element.short: True for sorting by LFM position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOf
element.short: Searches for an item by LFM or LRS position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOf.LFMPositions
element.short: True for searching an LFM position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange
element.short: Find a random item within an position range.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.FromPos
element.short: First acceptable position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.ToPos
element.short: First position after the range (exclude).

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.IndexOfRange.LFMPositions
element.short: True for searching LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition
element.short: Change the position of an item within the given position range.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.FromPos
element.short: First acceptable position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.ToPos
element.short: First position after the range (exclude).

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.MappedPos
element.short: The new position.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.SetPosition.LFMtoLRSPositions
element.short: True for using LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Add
element.short: Adds a new item to the Data property using the specified positions and pointer to the item data.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.LFM
element.short: Indexed access to the LFM positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.LRS
element.short: Indexed access to the LRS positions.

element.name: TLRPositionLinks.Data
element.short: Indexed access to the Data pointers.

element.name: TUTF8Parser
element.short: Parser for identifiers, and string and number literals.

descr.p: Use to get the next token. The token type also is available in Token.
Allowed whitespace is newline (CR,LF), tab and space.
Allowed identifiers consist of ASCII letters, digits or underscore.
Strings are a sequence of quoted strings or #nn characters.
Numbers are parsed as integer or floating point values, with toFloat values subdivided into number, single, date or currency, according to FloatType.
All other characters are returned literally.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fStream
element.short: The input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fBuf
element.short: The allocated buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fBufLen
element.short: Number of valid chars (bytes) in the buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fPos
element.short: Current position (index) in the buffer.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fLineStart
element.short: Buffer-relative begin of the current line.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fEofReached
element.short: True when reached the end of the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.fLastTokenStr
element.short: Holds the last parsed token text.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetTokenName
element.short: The name of a token, maybe the Token character itself.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.LoadBuffer
element.short: Fills the buffer from the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckLoadBuffer
element.short: Skips to the next non-null character.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ProcessChar
element.short: Add the current character to the token string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsNumber
element.short: True when the current character is a digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsHexNum
element.short: True when the current character is a hex digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsAlpha
element.short: True when the current character is an ASCII character (or underscore).
element.descr: Should mean: all allowed characters in an identifier. [To be updated for Unicode identifiers]

element.name: TUTF8Parser.IsAlphaNum
element.short: True when the current character is a digit or IsAlpha.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetHexValue
element.short: Returns the value of a hex digit.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.GetAlphaNum
element.short: Parses and returns an identifier.
element.errors: EParserError when the current character is not valid for an identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleNewLine
element.short: Skip CR/LF, adjust SourceLine.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SkipSpaces
element.short: Skip space and tab chars.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SkipWhitespace
element.short: Skip all whitespace characters.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleEof
element.short: Marks end of input reached (fEofReached).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleAlphaNum
element.short: Parse an identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleNumber
element.short: Parse a number, recognizing trailing floating point format specifiers.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleHexNumber
element.short: Parse a hex number, prefix the token string with '$'.
element.errors: EParserError when no valid hex digit was found.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleQuotedString
element.short: Parse an quoted string, excluding the leading and trailing quotes.
element.errors: EParserError on an unterminated string literal.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleDecimalString
element.short: Parse an decimal Unicode codepoint, return it as an UTF-8 string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleDecimalString.ascii
element.short: Is set to False on a non-ASCII character.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleString
element.short: Parses a string literal.

descr.p: The string can consist of quoted strings and Unicode codepoints. Surrounding quote characters are removed.
The result is stored in fLastTokenStr, in UTF-8 encoding.
The resulting token is toString for all-ASCII strings, else toWString.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleMinus
element.short: Tries to parse a negative number, or a single '-' character.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HandleUnknown
element.short: Sets Token to the unrecognized character (no error).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Create is the constructor for the class instance.

Create allocates a 4K buffer used to store the values read from Stream. The buffer is examined in the methods for the class. It initializes internal members used in the parser implementation to their default values. The internal buffer is loaded with the first 4K block of values in Stream, and the NextToken method is called to position the parser on the first token in the buffered values.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Create.Stream
element.short: Stream with the values parser in the class.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Destroy is the overridden destructor for the class instance. It moves the stream to the position returned from SourcePos (the position for the last processed value in the internal buffer). Destroy free the memory allocated for the internal buffer in the class instance.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckToken
element.short: Asserts that Token is of the expected type.
element.errors: EParserError when Token doesn't match the expected type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckToken.T
element.short: The expected token type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckTokenSymbol
element.short: Asserts that the given name was parsed (case insensitive).
element.errors: EParserError when Token doesn't match the expected type or name.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.CheckTokenSymbol.S
element.short: The expected identifier.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Error
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the given message.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Error.Ident
element.short: The message text.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the formatted message.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt.Ident
element.short: The Format string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorFmt.Args
element.short: The arguments to be formatted.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.ErrorStr
element.short: Raises an EParserError with the given message, adding source position information.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HexToBinary
element.short: Writes an hex value into the output stream.

descr.p: The hex digits must occur in pairs, for every byte.
The binary bytes are written in input order (highest first).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.HexToBinary.Stream
element.short: The output stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.NextToken
element.short: Parses the next token.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.NextToken.Result
element.short: The token type.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourcePos
element.short: Returns the current position in the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenComponentIdent
element.short: Parses an (possibly) qualified identifier, after a symbol has been parsed.
element.errors: EParserError when Token is not toSymbol.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenFloat
element.short: Returns the binary value of a floating point number.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenInt
element.short: Returns the binary value of an integral number.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenString
element.short: Returns the last parsed token as an string.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenSymbolIs
element.short: Compares the parsed symbol with the given string (case-insensitive).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.TokenSymbolIs.Result
element.short: True when a matching symbol has been parsed.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.FloatType
element.short: The type of the parsed floating point number. (number, date...).

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourceLine
element.short: The current line number in the input stream.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.SourceColumn
element.short: The current column number in the source line.

element.name: TUTF8Parser.Token
element.short: The last parsed token type.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue
element.short: A queue to stream components, used for multi-threading or network.

descr.p: ConvertComponentAsString converts a component to binary format with a leading size information (using WriteLRSInt64MB).
When streaming components over network, they will arrive in chunks. TCustomLazComponentQueue tells you, if a whole component has arrived.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.FQueue
element.short: Member with the dynamic storage for the queue..

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ReadComponentSize
element.short: Reads the component size and the length for the size value.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ReadComponentSize.Result
element.short: False if there is not enough storage in the queue for the component size.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ReadComponentSize.ComponentSize
element.short: Size of the component.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ReadComponentSize.SizeLength
element.short: Number of bytes needed for the component size value.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Create
element.short: Constructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Allocates resources needed for the internal queue storage.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Create.TheOwner
element.short: Owner of the class instance.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Destroy
element.short: Destructor for the class instance.

descr.p: Frees resources allocated to the internal queue storage.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Clear
element.short: Clears all values in the internal queue storage.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Write
element.short: Pushes values in Buffer onto the internal storage queue.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Write.Result
element.short: Number of bytes added to the queue in the method.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Write.Buffer
element.short: Untyped buffer with values pushed onto the internal queue storage.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.Write.Count
element.short: Number of bytes in Buffer.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.CopyFrom
element.short: Copies the specified number of bytes from the stream and pushes the values onto the queue.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.HasComponent
element.short: Determines whether the queue contains the entire contents of the component at the top of the queue.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ReadComponent
element.short: Reads a component from the queue and sets it owner.

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.ConvertComponentAsString
element.short: Converts a component to binary format with a leading size information (using WriteLRSInt64MB).

element.name: TCustomLazComponentQueue.OnFindComponentClass
element.short: Event handler signalled to get the class type for the specified class name in a TReader instance.

element.name: TLazComponentQueue
element.short: Publishes property from the ancestor class.

element.name: TLazComponentQueue.Name
element.short: Published Name for the component queue.

element.name: TLazComponentQueue.OnFindComponentClass
element.short: Published event handler used to get the class type for a give class name.

element.name: TPropertyToSkip
element.short: Contains information about a property omitted from LCL component streaming.

descr.p: TPropertyToSkip is a record type with information about a property in a persistent class that is omitted during LCL component streaming. TPropertyToSkip is the type maintained in the TPropertiesToSkip list when the RegisterPropertyToSkip routine is called.

element.name: TPropertyToSkip.PersistentClass
element.short: Class type for the persistent object with the omitted property.

element.name: TPropertyToSkip.PropertyName
element.short: Name for the omitted property.

element.name: TPropertyToSkip.Note
element.short: A note about the omitted property.

element.name: TPropertyToSkip.HelpKeyword
element.short: Help keyword for the omitted property.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip
element.short: Implements a list used to store properties which are skipped during LCL streaming.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Notify
element.short: Handles a notification action when the specified Pointer is added to or removed from the list.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.DoPropertyNotFound
element.short: Determines if the specified property type and name exists and is handled in the list.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.IndexOf
element.short: Gets the ordinal position in the list where the property type and name is stored.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.IndexOf.Result
element.short: Ordinal position in the list, or -1 when not found.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.IndexOf.AInstance
element.short: Property instance to locate in the list.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.IndexOf.APropertyName
element.short: Name for the property type to locate in the list.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.IndexOf.AClass
element.short: Class type for the property to located in the list.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add
element.short: Adds the specified property type and name to the list when not already present.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add.Result
element.short: Ordinal position in the list where the skipped property was found or stored.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add.APersistentClass
element.short: Class type for the skipped property.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add.APropertyName
element.short: Name for the skipped property.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add.ANote
element.short: Note to associate with the skipped property.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Add.AHelpKeyWord
element.short: Help keyword for the skipped property.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Items
element.short: Provides indexed access to skipped properties in the list by their ordinal position.

descr.p: Items is an indexed PRemovedProperty property used to access skipped property definitions by their ordinal position in the list. Read and write access for the property value ensures the inherited Get or Put methods are called.

element.name: TPropertiesToSkip.Items.AIndex
element.short: Ordinal position for the indexed property value.

element.name: LazarusResources
element.short: The list with all of the loaded standard resources.

element.name: PropertiesToSkip
element.short: Unit global variable with all of the registered skipped properties.

element.name: LRSObjectReaderClass
element.short: Class type for Lazarus Object Reader instances.

element.name: LRSObjectWriterClass
element.short: Class type for Lazarus Object Writer instances.

descr.p: FPC is not optimized for building a constant string out of thousands of lines. It needs huge amounts of memory and becomes very slow. Therefore big files are split into several strings.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader

descr.p: ReadLFMHeader is an overloaded procedure used to read the header for the LFM resource. The overloaded variants allow the LFM content to be read from either a TStream instance or a string value.
Values for the LFM resource type (optional), component name, and class name are returned in the corresponding output variables.
ReadLFMHeader is used to implement portions of the Lazarus IDE like the form editor, project inspector, and source code file manager.

element.version: Modified in LCL 2.4 to support use of unit name as a name space for classes in a LFM resource.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader.LFMStream
element.short: TStream instance with the LFM content read in the routine.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader.LFMType
element.short: Output variable which returns the type token for a resource item.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader.LFMComponentName
element.short: Output variable which returns the component name token for a resource item.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader.LFMClassName
element.short: Output variable which returns the class name token for a resource item. Allows unit name to be included as a name space for the class.

element.name: ReadLFMHeader.LFMSource
element.short: String type with the LFM content read in the routine.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile
element.short: Reads the LFM header from the specified file name.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile.Result
element.short: Returns True if the resource header is successfully read from the file and the LFM class name contains a non-empty value.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile.Filename
element.short: File with the LFM content read in the routine.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile.LFMType
element.short: Returns the resource type in the LFM header. Normally 'object'.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile.LFMComponentName
element.short: Returns the component name read from the LFM header. Like 'Form1'.

element.name: ReadLFMHeaderFromFile.LFMClassName
element.short: Returns the class name read from the LFM header. Like 'TForm1', but may also include a unit name space such as 'ns.unit2/TForm2'.

element.name: TLRSStreamOriginalFormat
element.short: Represent the LRS stream format offered as the original content for conversion routines like LRSObjectToText and LRSObjectResToText.

element.name: TLRSStreamOriginalFormat.sofUnknown
element.short: Format for the LRS stream is unknown.

element.name: TLRSStreamOriginalFormat.sofBinary
element.short: LRS stream contains binary content.

element.name: TLRSStreamOriginalFormat.sofText
element.short: LRS stream contains the text content.

element.name: WriteLRSWord
element.short: Writes a Word value to the specified resource stream.

descr.p: For platforms where FPC_LITTLE_ENDIAN is defined, the Write method in the Stream is called write the bytes in the word value. For Big Endian platforms, the WriteLRSReversedWord routine is called to write the byte values to the stream.

element.name: WriteLRSWord.s
element.short: TStream instance where the value is written.

element.name: WriteLRSWord.w
element.short: Word value written in the routine.

element.name: WriteLRSInt64MB
element.short: Writes an integer value, using the smallest possible representation.

element.name: WriteLRSNull
element.short: Writes the specified number of Null characters to a TStream instance.

descr.p: An ASCII NUL character has the value #0.

element.name: WriteLRSNull.s
element.short: TStream instance where the Null characters are written in the routine.

element.name: WriteLRSNull.Count
element.short: Number of Null characters written to the stream. If 0 is specified, a single null character is still written to the stream.

element.name: Register
element.short: Registers the component TLazComponentQueue.

element.name: ReadError
element.short: Raises an EReadError exception.

element.name: PropValueError
element.short: Raises an InvalidPropertyValue EReadError.
